instruction.value: for 4 doses. Administer dose over 30 minutes through an in-line 0.2 to 0.22 micron filter. If patient has experienced a prior infusion reaction, adminster all subsequent infusions over 90 minutes.

additionalnotes.value: If bilirubin is greater than 1.5 X upper limit normal or ALT or AST greater than 2.5 X upper limit normal: Hold treatment and contact prescriber. Doses are either delayed or discontinued for toxicity, doses are not reduced.
